posts.body: We textboard now.
too late

Axios has a new story about us. For some reason, I can't post the gif they made.
https://www.axios.com/what-to-do-about-8chan-the-nets-atrocity-megaphone-cb482e29-531a-46c5-bba7-c978ab9bb376.html

posts.subject: We Might Actually be Fucked After All
posts.body:
BitMitigate, which was hosting 8chan, has been deplatformed by their provider. **My mother just texted me and asked if I ever posted on 8chan and I had to call her explaining /pol/. This shit is out of control.**
https://twitter.com/CodeMonkeyZ/status/1158422046176530432

UPDATE: We might be migrating to ~~a new service again~~ nowhere I was retarded.
https://twitter.com/CodeMonkeyZ/status/1158428991755128832

UPDATE 2: We're apparently up on TOR, though it takes 10 minutes to load. But yeah, we're not as fucked as we were now.

UPDATE 3: ~~ACCESSED TOR SERVICE. /pol/ SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN DELETED. https://imgur.com/a/9hSy4bX~~ /pol/ APPEARS TO BE QUARANTINED LIKE /qresearch/

UPDATE 4: House Homeland Security Committee wants Jim to testify to congress.
https://twitter.com/HomelandDems/status/1158846043859148801

UPDATE 5: Epik will NOT provide protection for 8chan, claims inadequate enforcement in the past.
https://epik.com/blog/epik-draws-line-on-acceptable-use.html

==UPDATE 6: 8chan will stay down until after Jim's congressional testimony according to BitMitigate. Epik is still the DNS provider and domain registrar.==
==https://vch.moe/v/res/1297.html#1329==

>>8113315a-696f-409c-abdc-b462371f686e
It certainly does.

>>994bd070-d1c2-4643-bdb6-6bf524d46325
Nah, first time I posted it. I'm not the only person this has happened to?

I'm actually impressed with the amount of chaos. This entire thing is throwing the Internet into disarray.
https://twitter.com/voxility/status/1158405983376420866
I wonder if we can get Notch to step in.

posts.subject: Uncommon Time: The Last Stream (Probably)
posts.body: Things aren't looking good, at least in the short term. That being said, I hope there's interest in doing one more UT stream.

>>b292bc19-ee23-47f0-a588-eaff81b73cb3
Well, I'm sure that if he didn't want to do it publicly, he could get away with it anonymously.

>>1bde984e-36fa-4b03-ab36-5d104294f2e5
Give it time. We've faced potential shutdown before, though I must admit this is more severe than the last time.

So how do we crosslink now? No new information, just testing.

>>>/tech/0c97e3c798da
>>>/misc/640c1c30d565
If things are fucked, I'll keep posting here until there's no one else. You guys are my bros. **Embed related was made by Axios. Kinda funny.**

>>00236af4-f8e5-4bfe-b8da-fb73a78a3c8d
Sorry, mp4.

posts.subject: Share Thread - Down But Not Out Edition
posts.body:
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/OP-Pasta
'''READ ME BEFORE ASKING FOR ANYTHING YOU FAGGOT FUCK'''
Previous Thread: >>x ,archive

>How to Contribute
Post ITT, make a pull request (git client or gitgud IDE) or raise an issue.
If you do not have you own gitgud.io account and wish to make a pull request/raise an issue.
Manned1944@jourrapide.com
Username: A123
Pass: A123@486+0m

Before requesting first check:
'''Archives/Gitguds and that the links are up.'''
'''Wii ISO`s:Consoles/CheckingBeforePosting.'''
'''GOG:May 16th GOG dump (PC)/CheckingBeforePosting.'''

gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/CheckingBeforePosting
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/PC
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/GOG.sha256
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/Consoles
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/LewedGames
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/NotGames
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/OST
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/LargeTorrentListings
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/Archives
gitgud.io/Blank/stv/raw/m/QuickSearchableArchives

==UPDATE: Anons have experienced shady happenings with IGG (e.g. miners and shady extra files that served no purpose in terms of running the games), and they're from Vietnam.==
Pirate Site Slammed for Meddling with DRM-Free Games, Circumvention Ensues, TorrentFreak https://archive.fo/FJp57

We prefer danknet magnets links,not that shitty clearnet shit like bittorents and IPFS.
'''Read a book or something if you want to catchup'''
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anonymous_p2p#List_of_anonymous_P2P_networks_and_clients
wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Anonymising_yourself
privacytools.io, thatoneprivacysite.net
Save EVERYTHING >>>/eternalarchive/

If a password is required check the archives, especially the source thread (if listed).

>Bypassing Mega's bandwith quota
MegaDownloader + github.com/dannyvoid/FNSRWR or mega-dl (megatools) and a proxy.**%>!,-space, https://mega.co.nz/result**

__Guide to a happy Share Thread__
'''Leechers'''
1. Before requesting,search online and even use distributed search engines e.g.InfraSearch,Opencola,YaCy,FAROO. See below for famous links.
2. Look first in the archives and volafile.
3. Be as specific as possible.If you have the cover art of the file you want,post it in both the share thread and in vola room.
'''4. Due to asshats in the thread,links to files will be purposely misleading (have spaces,lines,keys&passwords split in the post),including torrent hashes.'''
 '''If you see a string of characters (e.g. c12fe1c06bba254a9dc9f519b335aa7c1367a88a) with or without dashes, it is a magnet link.'''
 '''If your bittorrent is shit,prepend magnet:?xt=urn:btih: to the string.'''
 '''a. Find and Replace (sed/tr/awk) is your friend.'''

'''Uploaders'''
1. When in doubt;upload,ask questions later.
2. Upload to many alternative sources (5+) and keep a local copy if space permits.
3. Use a URL shorterner (spaced or split) and/or paste relinks (e.g zerobin.net) on file links to confuse bots.
4. Encrypt your uploads now with a password,key, or generator.Rename the files something random, even their checksums.Maybe even pad files to the nearest GB or so,to confuse bots.
5. If your connection is stable,it is extremely advisable to self host. Using anonymity tools like Freenet,I2P,Gnunet,distributed NNTP or MixMinion/Mixmaster.

'''Volafile'''
1. Before uploading a batch of miscellaneous files,e.g images and music be sure they are unique enough to stand on their own and that you ask for the majority's the consensus whether to upload the files individually.
2. Vola room owner edit- Upload 5 files and then zip the rest if the dump is larger then 6-7 files. Music Albums exceeding 5 files are to be zipped.When uploading .torrent, either add them to the a zip of the game or just don’t upload those misc files.Properly label files so that they can be identified without asking someone else.For lewd stuff with filenames like RJ74765 either add a .txt linking to the contents on a website or just add the title to the .txt e.g "BIG BOOTY WOMEN SIT ON SHOTA FACE (RJ34734)".
3. You can filter files by file type (.txt, .rar, etc) or search the file list with the bar hidden by the filter files button.
 a. When in doubt,archive as a single [or split if too large],then upload.

So what can be done to make /pol/ not as much of a burden? Should Codemonkey attach a helpline and tipline at the top of the board? It's not directly interfering with the processes of it, but it does show some commitment to change, which is what Cloudfare wanted.

We're apparently trending on Twitter in the US with the hashtag #untwitter8chan. I don't think it'll be a big deal since Codemonkey doesn't violate any rules, but be vigilant. Reddit seems to also have mixed feeling about this whole debacle.

>>394b1945-91a8-43a4-99b3-0f9e1541a064
Posting is a lot faster. The interface needs to be fixed, but I actually like it more.

>>ed828f22-e1d7-4da0-822e-c115bb98e8b8
Where is this? Is there another bunker?
Jesus Christ he's really trying to burn us to the ground.

>>f0de39c8-1d29-45bb-9864-c866318fa022
It feels really comfy, like we're all in an actual bunker together as the bombs are dropped above us.

>>c2814c57-9186-4ce9-b156-61a2110ebf2e
I just arrived at the acceptance stage a few hours ago.

>>1779492e-c250-4f36-a560-f4412f0cd81d
There are too many security concerns and self-moderation aspect might fracture the community. This is a good place to regroup, but hardly ideal for the long term.
So vch.moe is a joint venture between Mark and Gahoole? If they're friends, why do we shit up each other's boards?
So does the way it work that we're seeding the files? Could we accidentally seed child pornography and get tracked for that?

>>7fa0a80c-7e15-428c-b4da-657981d5e76f
This is really fucked. 8chan has to get back online soon.

[aa]Does the aa tag work?[/aa]

>>83703607-71a3-418c-bf32-d36b4827d197
A textboard would be a great idea as a bunker. I'd be far more comfortable there.

>>91d5d9c1-c6d8-4ad7-90ae-2b65c14d6bfd
New Ben Garrison cartoon.
https://twitter.com/GrrrGraphics/status/1158768577299636225

>>91d5d9c1-c6d8-4ad7-90ae-2b65c14d6bfd
Is there a good free VPN?
/pol/ IS GONE FROM THE BOARD LIST. I'M GOING TO SEE IF IT'S STILL ACCESSIBLE AND JUST HIDDEN.

posts.subject: /pol2/ soon
posts.body:
I managed to access the hidden service after waiting several minutes and your board is no longer in the list. The board itself might still be accessible similar to how /qresearch/ is unlisted, but I'm just letting you guys know that you might actually be fucked. Imgur link because the image might be broken as I'm posting this through TOR.
https://imgur.com/a/9hSy4bX

EDIT - It's still there. It's just unlisted. You fags are safe after all.

>>f99660fe-66ba-4445-b972-c80c7d4a5d2a
I am talking about 8chan. It looks like it's been quarantined. I'm on it now.

>>d33c6328-7f16-47f5-95be-221bbe8659a5
False alarm. You guys are just quarantined like /qresearch/.

>>e516c5cc-68f5-448c-8e46-9200f3925078
Takes like 10-15 minutes to get it partially loaded. /pol/ is still loading for me.

>>6e423b65-84fb-44db-b25a-42ed07056347
What's the IP?

>>c384fcbf-7972-4606-a83d-075c539a3536
At his current size, a microwave might be too small. I think we should give him a new name. Instead of Hotwheels, it should be Bulldozer.

>>367be36f-043a-4277-93b6-44ec7bc0dc0c
>>8d0c02a5-c34a-4e55-a356-936cfbe86b03
>>63cb2319-738c-49d7-9de2-a6d0a523dc00
TORposting is still broken, so here's the larger picture.
https://vch.moe/v/src/1565125043255.png
Be positive, bros. Anyone got the Shin Godzilla one?

>>295bb241-f523-4483-96c4-7eda9d4e4807
Congressional testimony soon.

>>61f46662-e9d1-4854-9ca2-06f8af8e24a0
The want Jim to go on national television for two days to talk about shitposting. He can ignore the request, though they can try to subpoena him.

>>befb6999-3324-4fba-998d-03aa16e33106
Who knows? I feel like that this is largely distracting, though apparently the Chair and Ranking Member have wanted to do this for some time now.
Now that I think of it, Jim could probably submit a written testimony.

The letter of request has been posted to their Twitter. If the site goes back up at all, we'll get fucked hard without protection. This might be it, boys. At this point, I think there's more future in what Mark and Gahoole are doing. I'll keep waiting though...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CrXTS10h2WI

>>a4efd632-4bce-4021-b7c6-8670a013e60c
I like it too, but it's too risky to set up shop. We need an actual site, whether that's 8chan or another.

Jim sent a message to the government, but they thought it was spam. My fucking sides.

>>04a31170-e762-4c4d-a2ce-2d1ddeae8abc
Well, this ''is'' a honeypot. Or at least the Feds are most certainly monitoring it.

posts.subject: /v/ writes a letter to the House Homeland Security Committee
posts.body: Dear

>>86546b32-fc9d-4b5a-a8e9-465cddb23d04
**There are no GETs here, buddy. It's different for everyone.**
gangster

>>b03b71f5-8512-4b54-b4f7-3a0a2c00893d
Go to the board list and click the '''title''' of the board, not the URI, you want to mute.
**You faggots better post multiple times because that's the only way we're going to get this letter done. Just make sure that there are at least three or four posts in between yours.**
WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL
HE
Mark
I'm assembling the letter now.

I saved the file as a rtf, so I'm having formatting issues when converting it to PDF. Nevertheless, here it is in it's current state. If image is broken, I also uploaded it to vch.
https://vch.moe/v/src/1565200840772.png

>>98cfe46c-d223-4ec4-bd0a-60fdaabdfba0
It should be brought before Congress as we are representatives of the community. We should ensure that Jim receives it, but I will send a letter just to be sure.

>>b4c932ac-9125-4103-9b6b-e12378580b43
Oh shit I misspelled Philippines.

>>9f885edf-10ec-4151-9fe9-bc0ba3a85379
I'll continue if you fags want to.
Now what's the best way to send this? Should we just tweet it? They might misinterpret it as a threat unless context is provided.

Here's the FINAL version. I'm going to eat now.
https://vch.moe/v/src/1565198075517.png

>>4ad2d324-6839-49b1-a9eb-f6d314824404
Should I add a preamble or just keep it as is?
>Also "Ranking" under Mike Rogers is mispelled.
Good catch. Fixed.
https://vch.moe/v/src/1565200840772.png

>>2e41d340-08ff-4bf0-8d17-6a82d90abfd6
>>c51c0303-80c3-489b-abac-edd58ab4deb3
It's some issue with TOR. I hope that it's fixed eventually, but I don't have a VPN and this place is a honeypot.

**I'm a bit disappointed that no one seemed to noticed Mark's signature is a kikel, which is how non-English speaking Jewish immigrants marked their immigration papers because they associated the typical X mark with Christianity, hence the origin of the slur.**

Let's see if I can upload it as a PDF. I swear I'm not a fed. **I can't really do much about the artifacts. I had to change to a different word processor that didn't have the font.**

EDIT: Yeah, it's broken. Here it is on smugloli.
https://smuglo.li/a/src/1565246070866.pdf

>>0ac86d04-283d-4ba7-b545-7596f96059ee
8ch has been a honeypot since 2015 when /baphomet/ sent letters written in human blood and doxed a federal judge. Most of halfchan's changes were due to monetization rather than any moral responsibility. I think 8chan will continue to be moderated at the boarders of legality as it always has, though I think that the government may try to change where exactly those boarders lie. Jim and Ron also might change their stance on "embracing infamy" and discourage but not restrict certain types of behavior.
